Returns: true if the Row is selected, false otherwise.
isSelected().Description: Returns whether the Row is selected.

getSelectedItemViewHolder().Description: Return @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#ViewHolder_E@ of currently selected item inside a row ViewHolder.

syncActivatedStatus(android.view.View).Description: Synchronizes the activated status of view to the last value passed through @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#ViewHolder#setActivated_E@. No operation if @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#ViewHolder#setActivated_E@ is never called. Normally application does not need to call this method, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRowPresenter_E@ automatically calls this method when a child is attached to list row. However if application writes its own custom RowPresenter, it should call this method when attaches a child to the row view.

Returns: The row object bound to this ViewHolder.
getRowObject().Description: Returns the Row object bound to this ViewHolder.

getHeaderViewHolder().Description: Returns the view holder for the Row header for this Row.

Parameters: View: The View bound to the Row.

getOnItemViewClickedListener().Description: Returns the listener for item click event.

Returns: The row bound to this ViewHolder. Returns null if the row is not an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row_E@.
getRow().Description: Returns the row bound to this ViewHolder. Returns null if the row is not an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row_E@.

Returns: true if the Row is expanded, false otherwise.
isExpanded().Description: Returns whether the Row is in its expanded state.

setActivated(boolean).Description: Sets the row view's activated status. The status will be applied to children through @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#ViewHolder#syncActivatedStatus_E@. Application should only call this function when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#getSyncActivatePolicy_E@ is @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#SYNC_ACTIVATED_CUSTOM_E@; otherwise the value will be overwritten when expanded or selected status changes.

getSelectLevel().Description: Returns the current selection level of the Row.

getSelectedItem().Description: Return currently selected item inside a row ViewHolder.

getOnItemViewSelectedListener().Description: Returns the listener for item or row selection.
